entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person mentioned in the text as having returned with Hermione. He is described as being from Durmstrang and having a scowl on his face when mentioning Karkaroff.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person mentioned in the text as returning with Krum. She is described as being impassive when Ron stares at her.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person mentioned in the text as staring at Hermione and later asking for Krum's autograph.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person mentioned in the text as talking to Krum about Diggory and having his hand shaken by Krum.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is a person mentioned in the text as being liked by Krum. He is described as being polite to Krum even though he was from Durmstrang.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person mentioned in the text as being associated with Durmstrang and causing Krum to scowl.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person mentioned in the text as having shaken Harry's hand in a similar manner to how Krum shook his hand.

relationships.description: Krum liked Diggory, who was polite to him even though he was from Durmstrang.
Krum scowled when mentioning Karkaroff, indicating that he dislikes him.
Harry shook hands with Krum in a similar manner to how Fleur had done.
Ron asked Krum for his autograph, indicating that he is interested in meeting him.
